panels.description: The time in milliseconds from when the edge server is ready to send the first byte of the response to when the last byte reaches the kernel.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT $__timeInterval(reqTimeSec) as time,
quantile(0.25)(transferTimeMSec) as 25th,
quantile(0.5)(transferTimeMSec) as 50th,
quantile(0.75)(transferTimeMSec) as 75th,
quantile(0.9)(transferTimeMSec) as 90th,
quantile(0.95)(transferTimeMSec) as 95th,
quantile(0.99)(transferTimeMSec) as 99th
FROM ${table}
WHERE $__timeFilter(reqTimeSec)
AND $__conditionalAll( statusCode ${AND_statusCode} (${statusCode:sqlstring}), $statusCode)
AND $__conditionalAll( reqHost ${AND_reqHost} (${reqHost:sqlstring}), $reqHost)
AND $__conditionalAll( cacheStatus ${AND_cacheStatus} (${cacheStatus:sqlstring}), $cacheStatus)
AND $__conditionalAll( reqMethod ${AND_reqMethod} (${reqMethod:sqlstring}), $reqMethod)
AND $__conditionalAll( rspContentType ${AND_rspContentType} (${rspContentType:sqlstring}), $rspContentType)
AND $__conditionalAll( errorCode ${AND_errorCode} (${errorCode:sqlstring}), $errorCode)
AND $__conditionalAll( transferTimeMSec >= ${transferTimeMSec_percentile}, $transferTimeMSec_percentile)
AND $__conditionalAll(${metric_name} ${metric_filter} ${metric_value}, $metric_filter)
AND $__conditionalAll(reqPath ${AND_reqPath} (${reqPath:sqlstring}), $reqPath)
AND $__conditionalAll(cliIP ${AND_cliIP} (${cliIP:sqlstring}), $cliIP)
AND $__conditionalAll(country ${AND_country} (${country:sqlstring}), $country)
GROUP BY time ORDER BY time
SETTINGS hdx_query_max_execution_time=60

panels.title: Akamai Time

panels.description: The time in milliseconds from when the edge server receives the last byte of the request to when it sends the first bytes of the response.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT $__timeInterval(reqTimeSec) as time,
quantile(0.25)(turnAroundTimeMSec) as 25th,
quantile(0.5)(turnAroundTimeMSec) as 50th,
quantile(0.75)(turnAroundTimeMSec) as 75th,
quantile(0.9)(turnAroundTimeMSec) as 90th,
quantile(0.95)(turnAroundTimeMSec) as 95th,
quantile(0.99)(turnAroundTimeMSec) as 99th
FROM ${table}
WHERE $__timeFilter(reqTimeSec)
AND $__conditionalAll( statusCode ${AND_statusCode} (${statusCode:sqlstring}), $statusCode)
AND $__conditionalAll( reqHost ${AND_reqHost} (${reqHost:sqlstring}), $reqHost)
AND $__conditionalAll( cacheStatus ${AND_cacheStatus} (${cacheStatus:sqlstring}), $cacheStatus)
AND $__conditionalAll( reqMethod ${AND_reqMethod} (${reqMethod:sqlstring}), $reqMethod)
AND $__conditionalAll( rspContentType ${AND_rspContentType} (${rspContentType:sqlstring}), $rspContentType)
AND $__conditionalAll( errorCode ${AND_errorCode} (${errorCode:sqlstring}), $errorCode)
AND $__conditionalAll( transferTimeMSec >= ${transferTimeMSec_percentile}, $transferTimeMSec_percentile)
AND $__conditionalAll(${metric_name} ${metric_filter} ${metric_value}, $metric_filter)
AND $__conditionalAll(reqPath ${AND_reqPath} (${reqPath:sqlstring}), $reqPath)
AND $__conditionalAll(cliIP ${AND_cliIP} (${cliIP:sqlstring}), $cliIP)
AND $__conditionalAll(country ${AND_country} (${country:sqlstring}), $country)
GROUP BY time ORDER BY time
SETTINGS hdx_query_max_execution_time=60

panels.title: Application Time

panels.description: Number of request group by Response Code

targets.rawSql:
SELECT toString(statusCode) as HTTP_Status_Code, $__timeInterval(reqTimeSec) as time, count(*) as code
FROM ${table}
WHERE $__timeFilter(reqTimeSec)
AND $__conditionalAll( statusCode ${AND_statusCode} (${statusCode:sqlstring}), $statusCode)
AND $__conditionalAll( reqHost ${AND_reqHost} (${reqHost:sqlstring}), $reqHost)
AND $__conditionalAll( cacheStatus ${AND_cacheStatus} (${cacheStatus:sqlstring}), $cacheStatus)
AND $__conditionalAll( reqMethod ${AND_reqMethod} (${reqMethod:sqlstring}), $reqMethod)
AND $__conditionalAll( rspContentType ${AND_rspContentType} (${rspContentType:sqlstring}), $rspContentType)
AND $__conditionalAll( errorCode ${AND_errorCode} (${errorCode:sqlstring}), $errorCode)
AND $__conditionalAll( transferTimeMSec >= ${transferTimeMSec_percentile}, $transferTimeMSec_percentile)
AND $__conditionalAll(${metric_name} ${metric_filter} ${metric_value}, $metric_filter)
AND $__conditionalAll(reqPath ${AND_reqPath} (${reqPath:sqlstring}), $reqPath)
AND $__conditionalAll(cliIP ${AND_cliIP} (${cliIP:sqlstring}), $cliIP)
AND $__conditionalAll(country ${AND_country} (${country:sqlstring}), $country)
GROUP BY HTTP_Status_Code, time ORDER BY time
SETTINGS hdx_query_max_execution_time=60

panels.title: Hits per Response Code

panels.description: Number of request group by HTTP Status Code

targets.rawSql:
SELECT toString(errorCode) as Error_Code, $__timeInterval(reqTimeSec) as time, count(*) as error
FROM ${table}
WHERE $__timeFilter(reqTimeSec)
AND $__conditionalAll( statusCode ${AND_statusCode} (${statusCode:sqlstring}), $statusCode)
AND $__conditionalAll( reqHost ${AND_reqHost} (${reqHost:sqlstring}), $reqHost)
AND $__conditionalAll( cacheStatus ${AND_cacheStatus} (${cacheStatus:sqlstring}), $cacheStatus)
AND $__conditionalAll( reqMethod ${AND_reqMethod} (${reqMethod:sqlstring}), $reqMethod)
AND $__conditionalAll( rspContentType ${AND_rspContentType} (${rspContentType:sqlstring}), $rspContentType)
AND $__conditionalAll( errorCode ${AND_errorCode} (${errorCode:sqlstring}), $errorCode)
and errorCode is not NULL
AND $__conditionalAll( transferTimeMSec >= ${transferTimeMSec_percentile}, $transferTimeMSec_percentile)
AND $__conditionalAll(${metric_name} ${metric_filter} ${metric_value}, $metric_filter)
AND $__conditionalAll(reqPath ${AND_reqPath} (${reqPath:sqlstring}), $reqPath)
AND $__conditionalAll(cliIP ${AND_cliIP} (${cliIP:sqlstring}), $cliIP)
AND $__conditionalAll(country ${AND_country} (${country:sqlstring}), $country)
GROUP BY Error_Code, time ORDER BY time
SETTINGS hdx_query_max_execution_time=60

panels.title: Hits per Akamai Error Code

targets.rawSql:
SELECT $__timeInterval(reqTimeSec) as time,
sum(totalBytes) as Bytes_Delivered
FROM ${table}
WHERE $__timeFilter(reqTimeSec)
AND $__conditionalAll( statusCode ${AND_statusCode} (${statusCode:sqlstring}), $statusCode)
AND $__conditionalAll( reqHost ${AND_reqHost} (${reqHost:sqlstring}), $reqHost)
AND $__conditionalAll( cacheStatus ${AND_cacheStatus} (${cacheStatus:sqlstring}), $cacheStatus)
AND $__conditionalAll( reqMethod ${AND_reqMethod} (${reqMethod:sqlstring}), $reqMethod)
AND $__conditionalAll( rspContentType ${AND_rspContentType} (${rspContentType:sqlstring}), $rspContentType)
AND $__conditionalAll( errorCode ${AND_errorCode} (${errorCode:sqlstring}), $errorCode)
AND $__conditionalAll( transferTimeMSec >= ${transferTimeMSec_percentile}, $transferTimeMSec_percentile)
AND $__conditionalAll(${metric_name} ${metric_filter} ${metric_value}, $metric_filter)
AND $__conditionalAll(reqPath ${AND_reqPath} (${reqPath:sqlstring}), $reqPath)
AND $__conditionalAll(cliIP ${AND_cliIP} (${cliIP:sqlstring}), $cliIP)
AND $__conditionalAll(country ${AND_country} (${country:sqlstring}), $country)
GROUP BY time ORDER BY time
SETTINGS hdx_query_max_execution_time=60

panels.description: Number of requests group by Content Type

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
count(),
rspContentType
FROM ${table}
WHERE $__timeFilter(reqTimeSec)
AND rspContentType IS not NULL
AND $__conditionalAll( statusCode ${AND_statusCode} (${statusCode:sqlstring}), $statusCode)
AND $__conditionalAll( reqHost ${AND_reqHost} (${reqHost:sqlstring}), $reqHost)
AND $__conditionalAll( cacheStatus ${AND_cacheStatus} (${cacheStatus:sqlstring}), $cacheStatus)
AND $__conditionalAll( reqMethod ${AND_reqMethod} (${reqMethod:sqlstring}), $reqMethod)
AND $__conditionalAll( rspContentType ${AND_rspContentType} (${rspContentType:sqlstring}), $rspContentType)
AND $__conditionalAll( errorCode ${AND_errorCode} (${errorCode:sqlstring}), $errorCode)
AND $__conditionalAll( transferTimeMSec >= ${transferTimeMSec_percentile}, $transferTimeMSec_percentile)
AND $__conditionalAll(${metric_name} ${metric_filter} ${metric_value}, $metric_filter)
AND $__conditionalAll(reqPath ${AND_reqPath} (${reqPath:sqlstring}), $reqPath)
AND $__conditionalAll(cliIP ${AND_cliIP} (${cliIP:sqlstring}), $cliIP)
AND $__conditionalAll(country ${AND_country} (${country:sqlstring}), $country)
GROUP BY rspContentType ORDER BY count() DESC
SETTINGS hdx_query_max_execution_time=60

panels.title: Hits Per Content Type

panels.description:
Cache Hit Ratio :
sum of all request with cacheStatus: 1 / divided by total count of request

targets.rawSql:
SELECT time, cache_hit FROM(
SELECT $__timeInterval(reqTimeSec) as time,
sumIf(cacheStatus,1) as "cached",
cached/count() * 100 as "cache_hit"
FROM ${table}
WHERE $__timeFilter(reqTimeSec)
AND $__conditionalAll( statusCode ${AND_statusCode} (${statusCode:sqlstring}), $statusCode)
AND $__conditionalAll( reqHost ${AND_reqHost} (${reqHost:sqlstring}), $reqHost)
AND $__conditionalAll( cacheStatus ${AND_cacheStatus} (${cacheStatus:sqlstring}), $cacheStatus)
AND $__conditionalAll( reqMethod ${AND_reqMethod} (${reqMethod:sqlstring}), $reqMethod)
AND $__conditionalAll( rspContentType ${AND_rspContentType} (${rspContentType:sqlstring}), $rspContentType)
AND $__conditionalAll( errorCode ${AND_errorCode} (${errorCode:sqlstring}), $errorCode)
AND $__conditionalAll( transferTimeMSec >= ${transferTimeMSec_percentile}, $transferTimeMSec_percentile)
AND $__conditionalAll(${metric_name} ${metric_filter} ${metric_value}, $metric_filter)
AND $__conditionalAll(reqPath ${AND_reqPath} (${reqPath:sqlstring}), $reqPath)
AND $__conditionalAll(cliIP ${AND_cliIP} (${cliIP:sqlstring}), $cliIP)
AND $__conditionalAll(country ${AND_country} (${country:sqlstring}), $country)
GROUP BY time ORDER BY time)
SETTINGS hdx_query_max_execution_time=60

panels.title: Cache Hit Ratio

panels.description: Throughput is the sum of all bytes delivered / divided by sum of transfert time

targets.rawSql:
SELECT $__timeInterval(reqTimeSec) as time,
sum(totalBytes) / sum(transferTimeMSec/1000) as throughput
FROM ${table}
WHERE $__timeFilter(reqTimeSec)
AND $__conditionalAll( statusCode ${AND_statusCode} (${statusCode:sqlstring}), $statusCode)
AND $__conditionalAll( reqHost ${AND_reqHost} (${reqHost:sqlstring}), $reqHost)
AND $__conditionalAll( cacheStatus ${AND_cacheStatus} (${cacheStatus:sqlstring}), $cacheStatus)
AND $__conditionalAll( reqMethod ${AND_reqMethod} (${reqMethod:sqlstring}), $reqMethod)
AND $__conditionalAll( rspContentType ${AND_rspContentType} (${rspContentType:sqlstring}), $rspContentType)
AND $__conditionalAll( errorCode ${AND_errorCode} (${errorCode:sqlstring}), $errorCode)
AND $__conditionalAll( transferTimeMSec >= ${transferTimeMSec_percentile}, $transferTimeMSec_percentile)
AND $__conditionalAll(${metric_name} ${metric_filter} ${metric_value}, $metric_filter)
AND $__conditionalAll(reqPath ${AND_reqPath} (${reqPath:sqlstring}), $reqPath)
AND $__conditionalAll(cliIP ${AND_cliIP} (${cliIP:sqlstring}), $cliIP)
AND $__conditionalAll(country ${AND_country} (${country:sqlstring}), $country)
GROUP BY time ORDER BY time
SETTINGS hdx_query_max_execution_time=60

panels.title: Throughput

panels.description: Number of requests group by Hostname

targets.rawSql:
WITH (
        SELECT topK(50)(reqHost)
        FROM ${table}
        WHERE $__timeFilter(reqTimeSec)
        AND $__conditionalAll( statusCode ${AND_statusCode} (${statusCode:sqlstring}), $statusCode)
        AND $__conditionalAll( reqHost ${AND_reqHost} (${reqHost:sqlstring}), $reqHost)
        AND $__conditionalAll( cacheStatus ${AND_cacheStatus} (${cacheStatus:sqlstring}), $cacheStatus)
        AND $__conditionalAll( reqMethod ${AND_reqMethod} (${reqMethod:sqlstring}), $reqMethod)
        AND $__conditionalAll( rspContentType ${AND_rspContentType} (${rspContentType:sqlstring}), $rspContentType)
        AND $__conditionalAll( errorCode ${AND_errorCode} (${errorCode:sqlstring}), $errorCode)
        AND $__conditionalAll( transferTimeMSec >= ${transferTimeMSec_percentile}, $transferTimeMSec_percentile)
        AND $__conditionalAll(${metric_name} ${metric_filter} ${metric_value}, $metric_filter)
        AND $__conditionalAll(reqPath ${AND_reqPath} (${reqPath:sqlstring}), $reqPath)
        AND $__conditionalAll(cliIP ${AND_cliIP} (${cliIP:sqlstring}), $cliIP)
        AND $__conditionalAll(country ${AND_country} (${country:sqlstring}), $country)
    ) AS top_50_reqHost
SELECT
    count(),
    reqHost
FROM ${table}
WHERE $__timeFilter(reqTimeSec) AND has(top_50_reqHost, reqHost)
AND $__conditionalAll( statusCode ${AND_statusCode} (${statusCode:sqlstring}), $statusCode)
        AND $__conditionalAll( reqHost ${AND_reqHost} (${reqHost:sqlstring}), $reqHost)
        AND $__conditionalAll( cacheStatus ${AND_cacheStatus} (${cacheStatus:sqlstring}), $cacheStatus)
        AND $__conditionalAll( reqMethod ${AND_reqMethod} (${reqMethod:sqlstring}), $reqMethod)
        AND $__conditionalAll( rspContentType ${AND_rspContentType} (${rspContentType:sqlstring}), $rspContentType)
        AND $__conditionalAll( errorCode ${AND_errorCode} (${errorCode:sqlstring}), $errorCode)
        AND $__conditionalAll( transferTimeMSec >= ${transferTimeMSec_percentile}, $transferTimeMSec_percentile)
        AND $__conditionalAll(${metric_name} ${metric_filter} ${metric_value}, $metric_filter)
        AND $__conditionalAll(reqPath ${AND_reqPath} (${reqPath:sqlstring}), $reqPath)
        AND $__conditionalAll(cliIP ${AND_cliIP} (${cliIP:sqlstring}), $cliIP)
        AND $__conditionalAll(country ${AND_country} (${country:sqlstring}), $country)
GROUP BY reqHost
ORDER BY count() DESC
SETTINGS hdx_query_max_execution_time=60

panels.title: Top 50 Hostnames

panels.description: Number of requests group by Path

WITH (

        AND $__conditionalAll(cliIP ${AND_cliIP} (${cliIP:sqlstring}), $cliIP)

FROM ${table}
WHERE $__timeFilter(reqTimeSec) AND has(top_50_reqPath, reqPath)
AND $__conditionalAll( statusCode ${AND_statusCode} (${statusCode:sqlstring}), $statusCode)
        AND $__conditionalAll( reqHost ${AND_reqHost} (${reqHost:sqlstring}), $reqHost)
        AND $__conditionalAll( cacheStatus ${AND_cacheStatus} (${cacheStatus:sqlstring}), $cacheStatus)
        AND $__conditionalAll( reqMethod ${AND_reqMethod} (${reqMethod:sqlstring}), $reqMethod)
        AND $__conditionalAll( rspContentType ${AND_rspContentType} (${rspContentType:sqlstring}), $rspContentType)
        AND $__conditionalAll( errorCode ${AND_errorCode} (${errorCode:sqlstring}), $errorCode)
        AND $__conditionalAll( transferTimeMSec >= ${transferTimeMSec_percentile}, $transferTimeMSec_percentile)
        AND $__conditionalAll(${metric_name} ${metric_filter} ${metric_value}, $metric_filter)
        AND $__conditionalAll(reqPath ${AND_reqPath} (${reqPath:sqlstring}), $reqPath)
        AND $__conditionalAll(cliIP ${AND_cliIP} (${cliIP:sqlstring}), $cliIP)
        AND $__conditionalAll(country ${AND_country} (${country:sqlstring}), $country)
GROUP BY reqPath
ORDER BY count() DESC
SETTINGS hdx_query_max_execution_time=60

panels.title: Top 50 Path

panels.description: Number of requests group by Referer

targets.rawSql:
WITH (
        SELECT topK(50)(referer)
        FROM ${table}
        WHERE $__timeFilter(reqTimeSec)
        AND $__conditionalAll( statusCode ${AND_statusCode} (${statusCode:sqlstring}), $statusCode)
        AND $__conditionalAll( reqHost ${AND_reqHost} (${reqHost:sqlstring}), $reqHost)
        AND $__conditionalAll( cacheStatus ${AND_cacheStatus} (${cacheStatus:sqlstring}), $cacheStatus)
        AND $__conditionalAll( reqMethod ${AND_reqMethod} (${reqMethod:sqlstring}), $reqMethod)
        AND $__conditionalAll( rspContentType ${AND_rspContentType} (${rspContentType:sqlstring}), $rspContentType)
        AND $__conditionalAll( errorCode ${AND_errorCode} (${errorCode:sqlstring}), $errorCode)
        AND $__conditionalAll( transferTimeMSec >= ${transferTimeMSec_percentile}, $transferTimeMSec_percentile)
        AND $__conditionalAll(${metric_name} ${metric_filter} ${metric_value}, $metric_filter)
        AND $__conditionalAll(reqPath ${AND_reqPath} (${reqPath:sqlstring}), $reqPath)
        AND $__conditionalAll(cliIP ${AND_cliIP} (${cliIP:sqlstring}), $cliIP)
        AND $__conditionalAll(country ${AND_country} (${country:sqlstring}), $country)
    ) AS top_50_referer
SELECT
    count(),
    decodeURLComponent(referer) as referer
FROM ${table}
WHERE $__timeFilter(reqTimeSec) AND has(top_50_referer, referer)
AND $__conditionalAll( statusCode ${AND_statusCode} (${statusCode:sqlstring}), $statusCode)
        AND $__conditionalAll( reqHost ${AND_reqHost} (${reqHost:sqlstring}), $reqHost)
        AND $__conditionalAll( cacheStatus ${AND_cacheStatus} (${cacheStatus:sqlstring}), $cacheStatus)
        AND $__conditionalAll( reqMethod ${AND_reqMethod} (${reqMethod:sqlstring}), $reqMethod)
        AND $__conditionalAll( rspContentType ${AND_rspContentType} (${rspContentType:sqlstring}), $rspContentType)
        AND $__conditionalAll( errorCode ${AND_errorCode} (${errorCode:sqlstring}), $errorCode)
        AND $__conditionalAll( transferTimeMSec >= ${transferTimeMSec_percentile}, $transferTimeMSec_percentile)
        AND $__conditionalAll(${metric_name} ${metric_filter} ${metric_value}, $metric_filter)
        AND $__conditionalAll(reqPath ${AND_reqPath} (${reqPath:sqlstring}), $reqPath)
        AND $__conditionalAll(cliIP ${AND_cliIP} (${cliIP:sqlstring}), $cliIP)
        AND $__conditionalAll(country ${AND_country} (${country:sqlstring}), $country)
GROUP BY referer
ORDER BY count() DESC
SETTINGS hdx_query_max_execution_time=60

panels.title: Top 50 Referer

panels.description: Number of requests group by User Agent

targets.rawSql:
WITH (
        SELECT topK(50)(UA)
        FROM ${table}
        WHERE $__timeFilter(reqTimeSec)
        AND $__conditionalAll( statusCode ${AND_statusCode} (${statusCode:sqlstring}), $statusCode)
        AND $__conditionalAll( reqHost ${AND_reqHost} (${reqHost:sqlstring}), $reqHost)
        AND $__conditionalAll( cacheStatus ${AND_cacheStatus} (${cacheStatus:sqlstring}), $cacheStatus)
        AND $__conditionalAll( reqMethod ${AND_reqMethod} (${reqMethod:sqlstring}), $reqMethod)
        AND $__conditionalAll( rspContentType ${AND_rspContentType} (${rspContentType:sqlstring}), $rspContentType)
        AND $__conditionalAll( errorCode ${AND_errorCode} (${errorCode:sqlstring}), $errorCode)
        AND $__conditionalAll( transferTimeMSec >= ${transferTimeMSec_percentile}, $transferTimeMSec_percentile)
        AND $__conditionalAll(${metric_name} ${metric_filter} ${metric_value}, $metric_filter)
        AND $__conditionalAll(reqPath ${AND_reqPath} (${reqPath:sqlstring}), $reqPath)
        AND $__conditionalAll(cliIP ${AND_cliIP} (${cliIP:sqlstring}), $cliIP)
        AND $__conditionalAll(country ${AND_country} (${country:sqlstring}), $country)
    ) AS top_50_UA
SELECT
    count(),
    decodeURLComponent(UA) as userAgent
FROM ${table}
WHERE $__timeFilter(reqTimeSec) AND has(top_50_UA, UA)
AND $__conditionalAll( statusCode ${AND_statusCode} (${statusCode:sqlstring}), $statusCode)
        AND $__conditionalAll( reqHost ${AND_reqHost} (${reqHost:sqlstring}), $reqHost)
        AND $__conditionalAll( cacheStatus ${AND_cacheStatus} (${cacheStatus:sqlstring}), $cacheStatus)
        AND $__conditionalAll( reqMethod ${AND_reqMethod} (${reqMethod:sqlstring}), $reqMethod)
        AND $__conditionalAll( rspContentType ${AND_rspContentType} (${rspContentType:sqlstring}), $rspContentType)
        AND $__conditionalAll( errorCode ${AND_errorCode} (${errorCode:sqlstring}), $errorCode)
        AND $__conditionalAll( transferTimeMSec >= ${transferTimeMSec_percentile}, $transferTimeMSec_percentile)
        AND $__conditionalAll(${metric_name} ${metric_filter} ${metric_value}, $metric_filter)
        AND $__conditionalAll(reqPath ${AND_reqPath} (${reqPath:sqlstring}), $reqPath)
        AND $__conditionalAll(cliIP ${AND_cliIP} (${cliIP:sqlstring}), $cliIP)
        AND $__conditionalAll(country ${AND_country} (${country:sqlstring}), $country)
GROUP BY userAgent
ORDER BY count() DESC
SETTINGS hdx_query_max_execution_time=60

panels.title: Top 50 User Agent

GROUP BY cliIP
ORDER BY count() DESC
SETTINGS hdx_query_max_execution_time=60

WITH (
        SELECT topK(50)(country)
        FROM ${table}
        WHERE $__timeFilter(reqTimeSec)
        AND $__conditionalAll( statusCode ${AND_statusCode} (${statusCode:sqlstring}), $statusCode)
        AND $__conditionalAll( reqHost ${AND_reqHost} (${reqHost:sqlstring}), $reqHost)
        AND $__conditionalAll( cacheStatus ${AND_cacheStatus} (${cacheStatus:sqlstring}), $cacheStatus)
        AND $__conditionalAll( reqMethod ${AND_reqMethod} (${reqMethod:sqlstring}), $reqMethod)
        AND $__conditionalAll( rspContentType ${AND_rspContentType} (${rspContentType:sqlstring}), $rspContentType)
        AND $__conditionalAll( errorCode ${AND_errorCode} (${errorCode:sqlstring}), $errorCode)
        AND $__conditionalAll( transferTimeMSec >= ${transferTimeMSec_percentile}, $transferTimeMSec_percentile)
        AND $__conditionalAll(${metric_name} ${metric_filter} ${metric_value}, $metric_filter)
        AND $__conditionalAll(reqPath ${AND_reqPath} (${reqPath:sqlstring}), $reqPath)
        AND $__conditionalAll(cliIP ${AND_cliIP} (${cliIP:sqlstring}), $cliIP)
        AND $__conditionalAll(country ${AND_country} (${country:sqlstring}), $country)
    ) AS top_50_country
SELECT
    count(),

FROM ${table}
WHERE $__timeFilter(reqTimeSec) AND has(top_50_country, country)
AND $__conditionalAll( statusCode ${AND_statusCode} (${statusCode:sqlstring}), $statusCode)
        AND $__conditionalAll( reqHost ${AND_reqHost} (${reqHost:sqlstring}), $reqHost)
        AND $__conditionalAll( cacheStatus ${AND_cacheStatus} (${cacheStatus:sqlstring}), $cacheStatus)
        AND $__conditionalAll( reqMethod ${AND_reqMethod} (${reqMethod:sqlstring}), $reqMethod)
        AND $__conditionalAll( rspContentType ${AND_rspContentType} (${rspContentType:sqlstring}), $rspContentType)
        AND $__conditionalAll( errorCode ${AND_errorCode} (${errorCode:sqlstring}), $errorCode)
        AND $__conditionalAll( transferTimeMSec >= ${transferTimeMSec_percentile}, $transferTimeMSec_percentile)
        AND $__conditionalAll(${metric_name} ${metric_filter} ${metric_value}, $metric_filter)
        AND $__conditionalAll(reqPath ${AND_reqPath} (${reqPath:sqlstring}), $reqPath)
        AND $__conditionalAll(cliIP ${AND_cliIP} (${cliIP:sqlstring}), $cliIP)
        AND $__conditionalAll(country ${AND_country} (${country:sqlstring}), $country)
GROUP BY country
ORDER BY count() DESC
SETTINGS hdx_query_max_execution_time=60

WITH (
        SELECT topK(50)(city)
        FROM ${table}
        WHERE $__timeFilter(reqTimeSec)
        AND $__conditionalAll( statusCode ${AND_statusCode} (${statusCode:sqlstring}), $statusCode)
        AND $__conditionalAll( reqHost ${AND_reqHost} (${reqHost:sqlstring}), $reqHost)
        AND $__conditionalAll( cacheStatus ${AND_cacheStatus} (${cacheStatus:sqlstring}), $cacheStatus)
        AND $__conditionalAll( reqMethod ${AND_reqMethod} (${reqMethod:sqlstring}), $reqMethod)
        AND $__conditionalAll( rspContentType ${AND_rspContentType} (${rspContentType:sqlstring}), $rspContentType)
        AND $__conditionalAll( errorCode ${AND_errorCode} (${errorCode:sqlstring}), $errorCode)
        AND $__conditionalAll( transferTimeMSec >= ${transferTimeMSec_percentile}, $transferTimeMSec_percentile)
        AND $__conditionalAll(${metric_name} ${metric_filter} ${metric_value}, $metric_filter)
        AND $__conditionalAll(reqPath ${AND_reqPath} (${reqPath:sqlstring}), $reqPath)
        AND $__conditionalAll(cliIP ${AND_cliIP} (${cliIP:sqlstring}), $cliIP)
        AND $__conditionalAll(country ${AND_country} (${country:sqlstring}), $country)
    ) AS top_50_city
SELECT
    count(),
    city
FROM ${table}
WHERE $__timeFilter(reqTimeSec) AND has(top_50_city, city)
AND $__conditionalAll( statusCode ${AND_statusCode} (${statusCode:sqlstring}), $statusCode)
        AND $__conditionalAll( reqHost ${AND_reqHost} (${reqHost:sqlstring}), $reqHost)
        AND $__conditionalAll( cacheStatus ${AND_cacheStatus} (${cacheStatus:sqlstring}), $cacheStatus)
        AND $__conditionalAll( reqMethod ${AND_reqMethod} (${reqMethod:sqlstring}), $reqMethod)
        AND $__conditionalAll( rspContentType ${AND_rspContentType} (${rspContentType:sqlstring}), $rspContentType)
        AND $__conditionalAll( errorCode ${AND_errorCode} (${errorCode:sqlstring}), $errorCode)
        AND $__conditionalAll( transferTimeMSec >= ${transferTimeMSec_percentile}, $transferTimeMSec_percentile)
        AND $__conditionalAll(${metric_name} ${metric_filter} ${metric_value}, $metric_filter)
        AND $__conditionalAll(reqPath ${AND_reqPath} (${reqPath:sqlstring}), $reqPath)
        AND $__conditionalAll(cliIP ${AND_cliIP} (${cliIP:sqlstring}), $cliIP)
        AND $__conditionalAll(country ${AND_country} (${country:sqlstring}), $country)
GROUP BY city
ORDER BY count() DESC
SETTINGS hdx_query_max_execution_time=60

list.definition:
SELECT name
FROM system.columns
WHERE database = splitByChar('.', '${table}')[1]
AND table = splitByChar('.', '${table}')[2]
AND type IN ('Nullable(UInt8)', 'Nullable(UInt16)', 'Nullable(UInt32)', 'Nullable(UInt64)', 'Nullable(Int8)', 'Nullable(Int16)', 'Nullable(Int32)', 'Nullable(Int64)', 'UInt8', 'UInt16', 'UInt32', 'UInt64', 'Int8', 'Int16', 'Int32', 'Int64', 'Float', 'Nullable(Float)')
list.label: Filter on Metric
list.name: metric_name
list.query:
SELECT name
FROM system.columns
WHERE database = splitByChar('.', '${table}')[1]
AND table = splitByChar('.', '${table}')[2]
AND type IN ('Nullable(UInt8)', 'Nullable(UInt16)', 'Nullable(UInt32)', 'Nullable(UInt64)', 'Nullable(Int8)', 'Nullable(Int16)', 'Nullable(Int32)', 'Nullable(Int64)', 'UInt8', 'UInt16', 'UInt32', 'UInt64', 'Int8', 'Int16', 'Int32', 'Int64', 'Float', 'Nullable(Float)')

list.definition:
SELECT concat(project,'.`',table,'#.catalog`')
FROM (SELECT splitByChar('.','${table}')[1] as project, splitByChar('.','${table}')[2] as table)
list.name: catalog
list.query:
SELECT concat(project,'.`',table,'#.catalog`')
FROM (SELECT splitByChar('.','${table}')[1] as project, splitByChar('.','${table}')[2] as table)
